verses.text: PEA ko e Ngata na‘e olopoto lahi ‘i he manu kotoa pē ‘o e fonua, ‘a ia ne ngaohi ‘e Sihova ‘Elohimi. Pea ne huhū ange ki he fefine, ‘Oku mo‘oni koā kuo folofola ‘e he ‘Otua ke ‘oua te mo kai mei he ‘akau kehekehe ‘o e ngouetapu?
Pea tali ‘e he fefine ki he ngata, ‘Oku ngofua pē ‘ema kai ‘a e fua ‘o e ngaahi ‘akau ‘o e ngouetapu:
ka koe fua ‘o e ‘akau ‘oku ‘i he loto ngoue, kuo folofola ‘a e ‘Otua, ‘E ‘ikai te mo kai mei ai, pea ‘e ‘ikai te mo ala ki ai, na‘a mo mate.
Pea pehē ‘e he Ngata ki he fefine, ‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito te mo mate:
kaekehe, ‘oku mea‘i ‘e he ‘Otua ko e ‘aho te mo kai ai ‘e ‘ā ai homo mata, pea te mo hoko ke hangē ko e ‘Otua, ho‘omo ‘ilo ‘a e lelei mo e kovi.

Pea na‘e vakai ‘e he fefine ko e ‘akau ia ‘oku lelei ki he kai, pea matamatalelei ki he mata, kae‘uma‘ā ko e ‘akau ke fai ki ai ha vēlevele ko ‘ene fakapoto‘i, pea ne hanga ‘o toli hono fua, ‘o kai, pea ne ‘ange foki ki hono husepāniti na‘e ‘iate ia; pea kai mo ia.
Pea ‘ā ai hona mata ‘osi pē, ‘o na ‘ilo tā ‘oku na telefua; pea na tui lou fiki, ‘o ngaohi ‘aki hana vala.

Pea na‘a na fanongo ki he le‘o ‘o Sihova ‘Elohimi, he‘ene hā‘ele ‘i he ngouetapu ‘i he hauhaufano ‘o e ‘aho: pea toitoi ‘a e tangata mo hono uaifi ‘i ha loto ‘ulu‘akau ‘o e ngoue, ke ‘oua na‘a mea‘i kinaua ‘e Sihova ‘Elohimi.
Pea ui ki he tangata ‘e Sihova ‘Elohimi, ‘o ne pehē ki ai, Kofa‘ā koe?
Pea pehē ‘e ia, Na‘a ku fanongo ki ho le‘o ‘i he ngouetapu, pea u manavahē, koe‘uhi kuo u telefua; pea u toitoi.
Pea ne folofola mai, Ko hai na‘e fakahā kiate koe ‘oku ke telefua? Kuo ke kai koā mei he ‘akau na‘a ku tapui ho‘o kai mei ai, ‘ō?
Pea tali ‘e he tangata, Ko e fefine na‘a ke ‘omi ke ma nonofo, ko ia ia na‘a ne ‘omi ha‘aku me‘a mei he ‘akau, pea u kai.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova ‘Elohimi ki he fefine, Ko e hā eni kuo ke fai? Pea tali ‘e he fefine, Ko e Ngata na‘a ne kākaa‘i au, pea u kai.

Pea folofola ‘a Sihova ‘Elohimi ki he Ngata, Ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘o fai pehē, ‘e lahi taha ho‘o mala‘ia ‘i he manu lalata kotoa pē, mo e manu kaivao kotoa pē; te ke ‘alu ‘aki ho kete, pea te ke kai efu ‘i he ngaahi ‘aho kotoa pē ‘o ho‘o mo‘ui:
te u ‘ai ke mo fetāufehi‘a‘aki, ‘a koe mo e fefine, pea ko ho hako mo hono hako; ‘e laiki ‘e ia ho ‘ulu, pea te ke laiki ‘e koe ‘a hono muiva‘e.

Pea ki he fefine na‘a ne folofola, Te u mātu‘aki fakalahi ho‘o mamahi, kae‘uma‘ā ho‘o feitama; pea te ke fā‘ele‘i mamahi ‘a e fānau; kae tō ho‘o holi ki ho husepāniti, pea ‘e ‘a‘ana ‘a e pule kiate koe.

Pea kia ‘Ātama na‘a ne folofola, Ko e me‘a ‘i ho‘o fakaongo ki he lea ‘a ho uaifi, mo ke kai mei he ‘akau, ‘a ia na‘a ku tu‘utu‘uni ai ‘o pehē, ‘E ‘ikai te ke kai mei ai: kuo mala‘ia ‘a e kelekele koe‘uhi ko koe; te ke kai mei ai ‘i he mamahi ‘i he ‘aho kotoa pē ‘o ho‘o mo‘ui;
pea ko e ‘akau talatala mo e talatala‘āmoa te ne fakatupu ma‘a u; pea te ke kai ‘a e mohuku ‘o e ngoue;
te ke kai ho‘o me‘akai ‘i he kakava ‘o ho mata, kae‘oua ke ke foki ki he kelekele ‘a ia na‘e to‘o koe mei ai: he ko e efu koe, pea ko e efu te ke foki ki ai.
Pea fakahingoa ‘e he tangata hono uaifi ko ‘Ivi [ko Mo‘ui‘anga]; koe‘uhi ko e fa‘ē ia ‘a e kakai kotoa pē.
Pea na‘e ngaohi ‘e Sihova ‘Elohimi ma‘a ‘Ātama mo hono uaifi ‘a e ngaahi kofu kili‘imanu, ‘o ne ‘ai kiate kinaua.

Pea na‘e folofola ‘a Sihova ‘Elohimi; Vakai, kuo hoko ‘a e tangata ke hangē ko e toko taha ‘iate kitautolu, ke ne ‘ilo ‘a e lelei mo e kovi: ‘ē, na‘a ‘iloange te ne hanga ‘o toli foki mei he ‘Akau ‘o e Mo‘ui, ‘o ne kai, ‘o ne mo‘ui ‘o ta‘engata:
ko ia na‘e tuku atu ia ‘e Sihova ‘Elohimi mei he ngouetapu ‘i ‘Īteni, ke ne ngoue‘i ‘a e kelekele ‘a ia na‘e to‘o ia mei ai.
‘Io, ne kapusi ‘a e tangata; pea ne fakanofo ‘i hahake ‘i he ngouetapu ‘i ‘Īteni, ‘a e Selupimi, mo ha heletā ulo na‘e tavilovilo, mo le‘ohi ‘a e hala ki he ‘Akau ‘o e Mo‘ui.
